tool_description: The Random Text Generator API allows user to get random value for Email, URL, Name, Slug, Phone, Sentence and Paragraph. For Sentence and Paragraph endpoints, users can have options to add optional query parameters to return a combination of made-up words or real words. This API is useful to create mock data for Database, unit testing and many other usecases.
name: Random Text Generator
title: Random Text Generator

api_list.name: Get A Random Email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-text-generator.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-text-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get A Random Paragraph

optional_parameters.name: minSentences
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of sentences for the paragraph. Default value is 2.

optional_parameters.name: maxSentences
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of sentences in the paragraph. Default value is 15.

api_list.name: Get A Random Sentence

optional_parameters.name: realWord
optional_parameters.description:
If true, return a sentence as a combination of real words. However, it's not necessary that the sentence has any meaning.
If false, return a sentence as a combination of made-up words.
